atk-s0402a1:1_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame balānīti kenaṭṭhena balāni. Akampiyaṭṭhena balāni nāma, tathā
atk-s0402a1:1_2: Bhāvanābalanti brūhanabalaṁ vaḍḍhanabalaṁ. Suddhaṁ attānanti idaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a1:1_3: veditabbaṁ. Tatrāti tesu dvīsu balesu. Yamidanti yaṁ idaṁ. Sekhānametaṁ balanti sattannaṁ
atk-s0402a1:1_4: sekhānaṁ ñāṇabalametaṁ. Sekhañhi so, bhikkhave, balaṁ āgammāti sattannaṁ sekhānaṁ
atk-s0402a1:1_5: ñāṇabalaṁ ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca. Pajahatīti maggena pajahati. Pahāyāti iminā pana
atk-s0402a1:1_6: phalaṁ kathitaṁ. Yaṁ pāpanti yaṁ pāpakaṁ lāmakaṁ. Yasmā panetāni dvepi vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0402a1:1_7: arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti, tasmā ettha etadaggaṁ nāgatanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:2_0: 12. Dutiye satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvetītiādīsu ayaṁ heṭṭhā anāgatānaṁ padānaṁ vasena
atk-s0402a1:2_1: atthavaṇṇanā – vivekanissitanti vivekaṁ nissitaṁ. Vivekoti vivittatā. Svāyaṁ tadaṅgaviveko
atk-s0402a1:2_4: satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo. Tathā hi satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto
atk-s0402a1:2_5: yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:2_6: maggakāle pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṁ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ
atk-s0402a1:2_7: satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti. Pañcavidhavivekanissitampīti eke. Te hi na kevalaṁ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesuyeva
atk-s0402a1:2_9: uddharanti, na ca paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi. Tasmā tesaṁ matena etesaṁ jhānānaṁ
atk-s0402a1:2_10: pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṁ. Yathā ca “vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato
atk-s0402a1:2_12: vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo virāganissitantiādīsu. Vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo.
atk-s0402a1:3_0: Kevalaṁ hettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha
atk-s0402a1:3_1: pariccāgavossaggoti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena
atk-s0402a1:3_3: pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṁ. Tadubhayampi imasmiṁ lokiyalokuttaramissake
atk-s0402a1:3_4: atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṁ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese
atk-s0402a1:3_5: pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati. Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena
atk-s0402a1:3_6: vossaggatthaṁ pariṇamantaṁ pariṇatañca, paripaccantaṁ paripakkañcāti idaṁ vuttaṁ
atk-s0402a1:3_7: hoti. Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṁ
atk-s0402a1:3_8: nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṁ
atk-s0402a1:4_0: Idha pana nibbānaṁyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko, sabbesaṁ virāgabhāvato
atk-s0402a1:4_1: virāgo, nirodhabhāvato nirodhoti vuttaṁ. Maggo eva ca vossaggapariṇāmī, tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṁ
atk-s0402a1:4_2: bhāveti vivekaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṁ, tathā virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:4_3: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṁ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0402a1:4_4: ca pariṇataṁ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo sesabojjhaṅgesu. Iti
atk-s0402a1:4_5: ime satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā. Imesupi dvīsu balesu etadaggabhāvo
atk-s0402a1:5_0: 13. Tatiye vivicceva kāmehītiādīnaṁ catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ pāḷiattho ca bhāvanānayo ca
atk-s0402a1:5_1: sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritoyeva. Imāni pana cattāri jhānāni eko bhikkhu
atk-s0402a1:5_2: cittekaggatthāya bhāveti, eko vipassanāpādakatthāya, eko abhiññāpādakatthāya, eko
atk-s0402a1:5_3: nirodhapādakatthāya, eko bhavavisesatthāya. Idha pana tānipi vipassanāpādakāni adhippetāni.
atk-s0402a1:5_4: Ayaṁ hi bhikkhu imāni jhānāni samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a1:5_5: hetupaccayapariggahaṁ katvā sappaccayaṁ nāmarūpañca vavatthapetvā indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0402a1:5_6: samodhānetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti. Evametāni jhānāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0402a1:6_0: 14. Catutthe saṁkhittena ca vitthārena cāti saṁkhittadhammadesanā vitthāradhammadesanā
atk-s0402a1:6_1: cāti dveyeva dhammadesanāti dasseti. Tattha mātikaṁ uddisitvā kathitā desanā saṁkhittadesanā
atk-s0402a1:6_2: nāma. Tameva mātikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma. Mātikaṁ vā
atk-s0402a1:6_3: ṭhapetvāpi aṭṭhapetvāpi vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma. Tāsu saṁkhittadesanā
atk-s0402a1:6_4: nāma mahāpaññassa puggalassa vasena kathitā, vitthāradesanā nāma mandapaññassa. Mahāpaññassa
atk-s0402a1:6_5: hi vitthāradesanā atipapañco viya hoti. Mandapaññassa saṅkhepadesanā sasakassa uppatanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:6_6: viya hoti, neva antaṁ na koṭiṁ pāpuṇituṁ sakkoti. Saṅkhepadesanā ca ugghaṭitaññussa
atk-s0402a1:6_7: vasena kathitā, vitthāradesanā itaresaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vasena. Sakalampi hi tepiṭakaṁ saṅkhepadesanā
atk-s0402a1:7_0: 15. Pañcame yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇeti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:7_1: āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ yasmiṁ adhikaraṇe.
atk-s0402a1:7_2: Āpanno ca bhikkhūti āpattiṁ āpanno bhikkhu ca. Tasmetanti tasmiṁ etaṁ. Dīghattāyāti
atk-s0402a1:7_3: dīghaṁ addhānaṁ tiṭṭhanatthāya. Kharattāyāti dāsa-koṇḍa-caṇḍāla-venāti evaṁ kharavācāpavattanatthāya.
atk-s0402a1:7_4: Vāḷattāyāti pāṇi leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharaṇavasena kakkhaḷabhāvatthāya. Bhikkhū ca na
atk-s0402a1:7_5: phāsuṁ viharissantīti aññamaññaṁ vivādāpanne bhikkhusaṅghe yepi uddesaṁ vā paripucchaṁ
atk-s0402a1:7_6: vā gahetukāmā padhānaṁ vā anuyuñjitukāmā, te phāsuṁ na viharissanti. Bhikkhusaṅghasmiṁ
atk-s0402a1:7_7: hi uposathapavāraṇāya ṭhitāya uddesādīhi atthikā uddesādīni gahetuṁ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a1:7_8: vipassakānaṁ cittuppādo na ekaggo hoti, tato visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ na sakkonti. Evaṁ
atk-s0402a1:7_9: bhikkhū ca na phāsuṁ viharissanti. Na dīghattāyātiādīsu vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:8_0: Idhāti imasmiṁ sāsane. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṁ paccavekkhati. Akusalaṁ āpannoti
atk-s0402a1:8_1: ettha akusalanti āpatti adhippetā, āpattiṁ āpannoti attho. Kañcideva desanti na sabbameva
atk-s0402a1:8_2: āpattiṁ, āpattiyā pana kañcideva desaṁ aññataraṁ āpattinti attho. Kāyenāti karajakāyena.
atk-s0402a1:8_3: Anattamanoti atuṭṭhacitto. Anattamanavācanti atuṭṭhavācaṁ. Mamevāti maṁyeva. Tatthāti
atk-s0402a1:8_4: tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe. Accayo accagamāti aparādho atikkamitvā madditvā gato, ahamevettha
atk-s0402a1:8_5: aparādhiko. Suṅkadāyakaṁva bhaṇḍasminti yathā suṅkaṭṭhānaṁ pariharitvā nīte bhaṇḍasmiṁ
atk-s0402a1:8_6: suṅkadāyakaṁ aparādho abhibhavati, so ca tattha aparādhiko hoti, na rājāno na rājapurisāti attho.
atk-s0402a1:9_0: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yo hi raññā ṭhapitaṁ suṅkaṭṭhānaṁ pariharitvā bhaṇḍaṁ harati,
atk-s0402a1:9_1: taṁ saha bhaṇḍasakaṭena ānetvā rañño dassenti. Tattha neva suṅkaṭṭhānassa doso atthi,
atk-s0402a1:9_2: na rañño na rājapurisānaṁ, pariharitvā gatasseva pana doso, evamevaṁ yaṁ so bhikkhu
atk-s0402a1:9_3: āpattiṁ āpanno, tattha neva āpattiyā doso, na codakassa. Tīhi pana kāraṇehi tasseva
atk-s0402a1:9_4: bhikkhuno doso. Tassa hi āpattiṁ āpannabhāvenapi doso, codake anattamanatāyapi doso,
atk-s0402a1:9_5: anattamanassa sato paresaṁ ārocanenapi doso. Codakassa pana yaṁ so taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjantaṁ
atk-s0402a1:9_6: addasa, tattha doso natthi. Anattamanatāya codanāya pana doso. Tampi amanasikaritvā
atk-s0402a1:9_7: ayaṁ bhikkhu attanova dosaṁ paccavekkhanto “iti mameva tattha accayo accagamā suṅkadāyakaṁva
atk-s0402a1:9_8: bhaṇḍasmi”nti evaṁ paṭisañcikkhatīti attho. Dutiyavāre codakassa anattamanatā ca
atk-s0402a1:9_9: anattamanatāya coditabhāvo cāti dve dosā, tesaṁ vasena “accayo accagamā”ti ettha
atk-s0402a1:10_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti eko apākaṭanāmo brāhmaṇo. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti
atk-s0402a1:10_1: bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṁ. Tasmā yattha bhagavā, tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho
atk-s0402a1:10_2: veditabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena
atk-s0402a1:10_3: upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo
atk-s0402a1:10_5: viya. Upasaṅkamīti gatoti vuttaṁ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:10_6: Atha vā evaṁ gato tato āsannataraṁ ṭhānaṁ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṁ gantvātipi vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a1:11_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodīti yathā ca khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena, evaṁ sopi
atk-s0402a1:11_1: bhagavatā saddhiṁ samappavattamodo ahosi, sītodakaṁ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṁ ekībhāvaṁ
atk-s0402a1:11_2: agamāsi. Yāya ca “kacci, bho gotama, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci bhoto gotamassa
atk-s0402a1:11_3: ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya
atk-s0402a1:11_4: sammodi, taṁ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātassa sammodassa jananato sammodituṁ yuttabhāvato ca
atk-s0402a1:11_5: sammodanīyaṁ, atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṁ sāretuṁ nirantaraṁ pavattetuṁ
atk-s0402a1:11_6: araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṁ. Suyyamānasukhato vā sammodanīyaṁ, anussariyamānasukhato
atk-s0402a1:11_7: sāraṇīyaṁ, tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṁ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti
atk-s0402a1:11_8: evaṁ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ kathaṁ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a1:11_9: yenatthena āgato, taṁ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0402a1:12_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṁ nisinno hoti, tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a1:12_2: Bhummatthe vā etaṁ upayogavacanaṁ. Nisīdīti upāvisi. Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhānīyaṁ
atk-s0402a1:12_3: upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṁ nisīdanti. Ayañca nesaṁ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0402a1:13_0: Kathaṁ nisinno pana ekamantaṁ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṁ
atk-s0402a1:13_1: – atidūraṁ, accāsannaṁ, uparivātaṁ, unnatappadesaṁ, atisammukhaṁ atipacchāti. Atidūre
atk-s0402a1:13_2: nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṁ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno
atk-s0402a1:13_3: saṅghaṭṭanaṁ karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno
atk-s0402a1:13_4: agāravaṁ pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṁ āhacca
atk-s0402a1:13_5: daṭṭhabbaṁ hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṁ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṁ
atk-s0402a1:13_6: hoti. Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi. Tena vuttaṁ “ekamantaṁ nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0402a1:14_0: Etadavocāti duvidhā hi pucchā – agārikapucchā, anagārikapucchā ca. Tattha “kiṁ, bhante,
atk-s0402a1:14_1: kusalaṁ, kiṁ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā. “Ime nu kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti
atk-s0402a1:14_2: iminā nayena anagārikapucchā. Ayaṁ pana attano anurūpaṁ agārikapucchaṁ pucchanto
atk-s0402a1:14_3: etaṁ “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo”tiādivacanaṁ avoca. Tattha hetu paccayoti
atk-s0402a1:14_5: visamacariyāya hetu, taṁkāraṇā tappaccayāti attho. Tatrāyaṁ padattho – adhammassa
atk-s0402a1:14_6: cariyā adhammacariyā, adhammakāraṇanti attho. Visamaṁ cariyā, visamassa vā kammassa
atk-s0402a1:14_7: cariyāti visamacariyā. Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā.
atk-s0402a1:14_8: Etenupāyena sukkapakkhepi attho veditabbo. Atthato panettha adhammacariyāvisamacariyā
atk-s0402a1:14_9: nāma dasa akusalakammapathā, dhammacariyāsamacariyā nāma dasa kusalakammapathāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a1:15_0: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotamāti ettha ayaṁ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanesu
atk-s0402a1:15_1: dissati. “Abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu
atk-s0402a1:15_2: hi khaye dissati. “Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0402a1:16: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0402a1:18: Ādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṁ, bhante”tiādīsu abbhanumodane. Idhāpi abbhanumodaneyeva. Yasmā ca abbhanumodane, tasmā sādhu sādhu, bho gotamāti vuttaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:20: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho”ti. –
atk-s0402a1:21: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṁsāvasena cāyaṁ dvikkhattuṁ vuttoti veditabbo. Atha vā abhikkantanti abhikkantaṁ atiiṭṭhaṁ atimanāpaṁ, atisundaranti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a1:22_0: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṁ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṁ. Ayañhettha
atk-s0402a1:22_1: adhippāyo – abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, yadidaṁ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṁ
atk-s0402a1:22_2: yadidaṁ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṁ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:22_3: dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi – bhoto gotamassa vacanaṁ abhikkantaṁ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0402a1:22_4: abhikkantaṁ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato,
atk-s0402a1:22_5: uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṁsanato, aparavambhanato,
atk-s0402a1:23_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṁyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭhapitaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:23_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṁ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti uparimukhaṁ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādichāditaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:23_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṁ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0402a1:24_0: Ayaṁ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṁ ukkujjeyya, evaṁ saddhammavimukhaṁ
atk-s0402a1:24_1: asaddhamme patitaṁ maṁ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṁ vivareyya, evaṁ
atk-s0402a1:24_2: kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṁ sāsanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:24_3: vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṁ ācikkheyya, evaṁ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa
atk-s0402a1:24_4: me saggamokkhamaggaṁ āvikarontena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya, evaṁ mohandhakāre
atk-s0402a1:24_6: mayhaṁ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0402a1:25_0: Evaṁ desanaṁ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṁ karonto
atk-s0402a1:25_1: esāhantiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṁ. Bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti bhavaṁ
atk-s0402a1:25_2: me gotamo saraṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṁ
atk-s0402a1:25_3: gotamaṁ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṁ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti. Yesañhi
atk-s0402a1:25_4: dhātūnaṁ gati attho, buddhipi tesaṁ attho. Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti
atk-s0402a1:25_5: ayamattho vutto. Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe
atk-s0402a1:25_6: yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāne ca catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. So atthato
atk-s0402a1:25_7: ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. Vuttañhetaṁ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo
atk-s0402a1:25_8: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro. Na kevalañca ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca,
atk-s0402a1:25_9: apica kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṁ pariyattidhammopi. Vuttañhetaṁ chattamāṇavakavimāne –
atk-s0402a1:28_0: Ettha rāgavirogoti maggo kathito. Anojamasokanti phalaṁ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:28_1: Appaṭikūlaṁ madhuramimaṁpaguṇaṁ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0402a1:28_2: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṁhatoti saṅgho. So atthato aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho. Vuttañhetaṁ tasmiyeva vimāne –
atk-s0402a1:30: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṁ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a1:31: Bhikkhūnaṁ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0402a1:32: Idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṁ saraṇaṁ, saraṇagamanaṁ, yo ca saraṇaṁ gacchati, saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṁ, saṁkileso, bhedoti ayaṁ vidhi veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:33_0: Seyyathidaṁ – padatthato tāva hiṁsatīti saraṇaṁ, saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena
atk-s0402a1:33_1: bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiparikilesaṁ hanati vināsetīti attho, ratanattayassevetaṁ
atk-s0402a1:33_2: adhivacanaṁ. Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsatīti
atk-s0402a1:33_3: buddho, bhavakantārā uttāraṇena lokassa assāsadānena ca dhammo, appakānampi kārānaṁ
atk-s0402a1:33_4: vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena ratanattayaṁ saraṇaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:33_6: Taṁsamaṅgīsatto saraṇaṁ gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena “etāni me tīṇi ratanāni
atk-s0402a1:33_7: saraṇaṁ, etāni parāyaṇa”nti evaṁ upetīti attho. Evaṁ tāva saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ yo
atk-s0402a1:33_8: ca saraṇaṁ gacchati idaṁ tayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:34_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ lokuttaraṁ lokiyañcāti. Tattha lokuttaraṁ
atk-s0402a1:34_2: hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Lokiyaṁ puthujjanānaṁ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena
atk-s0402a1:34_3: ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṁ hutvā ijjhati. Taṁ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho,
atk-s0402a1:34_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a1:35_0: Tayidaṁ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena
atk-s0402a1:35_1: paṇipātenāti. Tattha attasanniyyātanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ attānaṁ buddhassa
atk-s0402a1:35_2: niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā”ti evaṁ buddhādīnaṁ attapariccajanaṁ. Tapparāyaṇatā
atk-s0402a1:35_3: nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ buddhaparāyaṇo, dhammaparāyaṇo, saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṁ
atk-s0402a1:35_4: dhārethā”ti evaṁ tapparāyaṇabhāvo. Sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ
atk-s0402a1:35_5: buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassa iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ sissabhāvūpagamo.
atk-s0402a1:35_7: buddhādīnaṁyeva tiṇṇaṁ vatthūnaṁ karomi iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0402a1:35_8: Imesañhi catunnampi ākārānaṁ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṁyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:36_0: Apica “bhagavato attānaṁ pariccajāmi, dhammassa, saṅghassa attānaṁ pariccajāmi, jīvitaṁ
atk-s0402a1:36_1: pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṁyeva me jīvitaṁ, jīvitapariyantikaṁ
atk-s0402a1:36_2: buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṁ leṇaṁ tāṇa”nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:36_3: veditabbaṁ. “Satthārañca vatāhaṁ passeyyaṁ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṁ, sugatañca vatāhaṁ
atk-s0402a1:36_4: passeyyaṁ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṁ, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṁ passeyyaṁ, bhagavantameva
atk-s0402a1:36_5: passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamane viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:37: “So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
atk-s0402a1:39_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. “Atha kho brahmāyu
atk-s0402a1:39_1: brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0402a1:39_2: bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti
atk-s0402a1:39_3: – ‘brahmāyu ahaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo; brahmāyu ahaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo”’ti evampi paṇipāto veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:40_0: So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyavasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātena
atk-s0402a1:40_1: saraṇagamanaṁ hoti, na itarehi. Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṁ gaṇhāti, seṭṭhavasena ca
atk-s0402a1:40_2: bhijjati. Tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṁ ñātako”ti vandati, aggahitameva
atk-s0402a1:40_3: hoti saraṇaṁ. Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi
atk-s0402a1:40_4: kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṁ. Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato
atk-s0402a1:40_5: santike kiñci uggahitaṁ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0402a1:43: Evarūpaṁ anusāsaniṁ uggahetvā “ācariyo me”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṁ. Yo pana “ayaṁ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo”ti vandati, teneva gahitaṁ hoti saraṇaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:44_0: Evaṁ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṁ
atk-s0402a1:44_1: “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṁ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṁ. Tathā rājānaṁ
atk-s0402a1:44_2: bhayavasena vandato. So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti. Tathā
atk-s0402a1:44_3: yaṁ kiñci sippaṁ sikkhāpakaṁ titthiyaṁ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti
atk-s0402a1:45: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṁ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṁsaphalaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:46: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato;
atk-s0402a1:52: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasenapetassa ānisaṁsaphalaṁ veditabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:53_0: “Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṁ niccato
atk-s0402a1:53_1: upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṁ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṁ jīvitā
atk-s0402a1:53_2: voropeyya, pitaraṁ, arahantaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, paduṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṁ
atk-s0402a1:53_3: uppādeyya, saṅghaṁ bhindeyya, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyya, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0402a1:54: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:60_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0402a1:60_1: tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0402a1:60_2: etadavoca – ‘sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti. Buddhasaraṇagamanahetu
atk-s0402a1:60_3: kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ
atk-s0402a1:60_4: upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena
atk-s0402a1:60_5: sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī”’ti.
atk-s0402a1:61: Eseva nayo dhamme saṅghe ca. Apica velāmasuttādivasenāpi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. Evaṁ saraṇagamanaphalaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:62_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṁ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṁkilissati,
atk-s0402a1:62_1: na mahājutikaṁ hoti na mahāvipphāraṁ. Lokuttarassa natthi saṁkileso. Lokiyassa ca
atk-s0402a1:62_2: saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca. Tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu
atk-s0402a1:62_3: attasanniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. Anavajjo kālakiriyāya, so avipākattā
atk-s0402a1:62_4: aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṁ satthāraṁ
atk-s0402a1:62_5: na uddisatīti evaṁ saraṇagamanassa saṁkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:63_0: Upāsakaṁmaṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretūti maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṁ dhāretu,
atk-s0402a1:63_1: jānātūti attho. Upāsakavidhikosallatthaṁ panettha ko upāsako, kasmā upāsakoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a1:63_2: kimassa sīlaṁ, ko ājīvo, kā vipatti, kā sampattīti idaṁ pakiṇṇakaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:64: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci saraṇagato gahaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:65: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a1:66: Kasmāupāsakoti. Ratanattayassa upāsanato. So hi buddhaṁ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṁ, saṅghaṁ upāsatīti upāsakoti.
atk-s0402a1:68_0: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā, kāmesumicchācārā,
atk-s0402a1:68_1: musāvādā, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a1:69: Ko ājīvoti. Pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvikakappanaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:70_0: “Pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca. Satthavaṇijjā, sattavaṇijjā,
atk-s0402a1:70_1: maṁsavaṇijjā, majjavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti.
atk-s0402a1:71_0: Kā vipattīti. Yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti, ayamassa vipatti. Apica
atk-s0402a1:71_1: yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca, sāpi tassa vipattīti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a1:71_2: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a1:72_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca
atk-s0402a1:72_1: upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko
atk-s0402a1:72_2: hoti, maṅgalaṁ pacceti no kammaṁ, ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṁ pariyesati, tattha
atk-s0402a1:73: Kā sampattīti. Yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca, sā sampatti. Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a1:74_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca
atk-s0402a1:74_1: upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko
atk-s0402a1:74_2: hoti, kammaṁ pacceti no maṅgalaṁ, na ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṁ gavesati, idha ca
atk-s0402a1:75_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṁ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge samma,
atk-s0402a1:75_1: dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṁ nigaṇṭhānaṁ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati. “Teneva
atk-s0402a1:75_2: aṅgulaggena taṁ aṅgulaggaṁ parāmaseyya. Ucchaggaṁ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṁ. “Ambilaggaṁ
atk-s0402a1:75_3: vā madhuraggaṁ vā tittakaggaṁ vā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena
atk-s0402a1:75_4: vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṁ
atk-s0402a1:75_5: aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe. Idha panāyaṁ ādimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṁ
atk-s0402a1:75_6: ādiṁ katvāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvaṁ. Ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho,
atk-s0402a1:75_7: dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṁ katvāti attho.
atk-s0402a1:76_0: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṁ, yāva me jīvitaṁ pavattati, tāva upetaṁ, anaññasatthukaṁ
atk-s0402a1:76_1: tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṁ gataṁ upāsakaṁ kappiyakārakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu
atk-s0402a1:76_2: jānātu. Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṁ chindeyya, neva buddhaṁ “na buddho”ti
atk-s0402a1:76_3: vā dhammaṁ “na dhammo”ti vā saṅghaṁ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti evaṁ attasanniyyātanena
atk-s0402a1:76_4: saraṇaṁ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
atk-s0402a1:77_0: 17. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti jāṇussoṇiṭhānantaraṁ kira nāmekaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ, taṁ yena kulena
atk-s0402a1:77_1: laddhaṁ, taṁ jāṇussoṇikulanti vuccati. Ayaṁ tasmiṁ kule jātattā rañño santike ca
atk-s0402a1:77_2: laddhajāṇussoṇisakkārattā jāṇussoṇīti vuccati. Tenupasaṅkamīti “samaṇo kira gotamo
atk-s0402a1:77_3: paṇḍito byatto bahussuto”ti sutvā “sace so liṅgavibhattikārakādibhedaṁ jānissati,
atk-s0402a1:77_4: amhehi ñātameva jānissati, aññātaṁ kiṁ jānissati. Ñātameva kathessati, aññātaṁ kiṁ
atk-s0402a1:77_5: kathessatī”ti cintetvā mānaddhajaṁ paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā mahāparivārehi parivuto
atk-s0402a1:77_6: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cāti satthā tassa vacanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:77_7: sutvā “ayaṁ brāhmaṇo idha āgacchanto na jānitukāmo atthagavesī hutvā āgato, mānaṁ
atk-s0402a1:77_8: pana paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā āgato. Kiṁ nu khvassa yathā pañhassa atthaṁ jānāti,
atk-s0402a1:77_9: evaṁ kathite vaḍḍhi bhavissati, udāhu yathā na jānātī”ti cintetvā “yathā na jānāti,
atk-s0402a1:77_10: evaṁ kathite vaḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a1:78_0: Brāhmaṇo taṁ sutvā “samaṇo gotamo katattāpi akatattāpi niraye nibbattiṁ vadati, idaṁ
atk-s0402a1:78_1: ubhayakāraṇenāpi ekaṭṭhāne nibbattiyā kathitattā dujjānaṁ mahandhakāraṁ, natthi mayhaṁ
atk-s0402a1:78_2: ettha patiṭṭhā. Sace panāhaṁ ettakeneva tuṇhī bhaveyyaṁ, brāhmaṇānaṁ majjhe kathanakālepi
atk-s0402a1:78_3: maṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – ‘tvaṁ samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṁ mānaṁ paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0402a1:78_4: gatosi, ekavacaneneva tuṇhī hutvā kiñci vattuṁ nāsakkhi, imasmiṁ ṭhāne kasmā kathesī’ti.
atk-s0402a1:78_5: Tasmā parājitopi aparājitasadiso hutvā puna saggagamanapañhaṁ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0402a1:78_6: ko nu kho, bho gotamāti imaṁ dutiyapañhaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a1:79_0: Evampi tassa ahosi – “uparipañhena heṭṭhāpañhaṁ jānissāmi, heṭṭhāpañhena uparipañha”nti.
atk-s0402a1:79_1: Tasmāpi imaṁ pañhaṁ pucchi. Satthā purimanayeneva cintetvā yathā na jānāti, evameva
atk-s0402a1:79_2: kathento punapi “katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo tasmimpi patiṭṭhātuṁ
atk-s0402a1:79_3: asakkonto “alaṁ, bho, na īdisassa purisassa santikaṁ āgatena ajānitvā gantuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a1:79_4: sakavādaṁ pahāya samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ anuvattitvā mayhaṁ atthaṁ gavesissāmi, paralokamaggaṁ
atk-s0402a1:79_5: sodhessāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṁ katvā satthāraṁ āyācanto na kho ahantiādimāha. Athassa
atk-s0402a1:79_6: nihatamānataṁ ñatvā satthā upari desanaṁ vaḍḍhento tena hi, brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a1:79_7: tena hīti kāraṇaniddeso. Yasmā saṁkhittena bhāsitassa atthaṁ ajānanto vitthāradesanaṁ
atk-s0402a1:80_0: 18. Aṭṭhame āyasmāti piyavacanametaṁ. Ānandoti tassa therassa nāmaṁ. Ekaṁsenāti ekantena.
atk-s0402a1:80_1: Anuviccāti anupavisitvā. Viññūti paṇḍitā. Garahantīti nindanti, avaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti.
atk-s0402a1:81_0: 20. Dasame dunnikkhittañca padabyañjananti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitapāḷipadameva hi atthassa
atk-s0402a1:81_1: byañjanattā byañjananti vuccati. Ubhayametaṁ pāḷiyāva nāmaṁ. Attho ca dunnītoti parivattetvā
atk-s0402a1:81_2: uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitā aṭṭhakathā. Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi
atk-s0402a1:81_3: dunnayo hotīti parivattetvā uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathā nāma dunnayā
atk-s0402a1:81_4: dunnīhārā dukkathā nāma hoti. Ekādasame vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabboti.
